name: storybook-ca-gov
description: An instance of Storybook intended for developing sharable web components.

scripts.build: npm run build-storybook && git add storybook-static && git commit -m 'update storybook-static build'
scripts.update:build: npm run build-storybook && git add storybook-static && git commit -m 'update storybook static build' && git checkout build && rm -rf main* vendors* runtime* && git checkout main storybook-static && mv storybook-static/* ./ && git add . && git commit -m 'update build' && echo "Build complete you can check in a PR based off this build now." && git checkout main
